channel.title: Need help with coding rules

item.title: Need help with coding rules
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

i need help can u one of u guys help me make it so the rules go on the rules menu take a look
and another thing i want u guys to take a look at is my commands because im the owner of my server and i have my own commands and my 2 co-owners want to be able to use them but i dont know how to do that look at code after the rules one

sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to @red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y @red@p@gre@k", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by mervboyj@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@~ The Rules ~", 8149);
sendQuest("@red@As you know, many servers have rules and guidelines.", 8150);
sendQuest("@red@@red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y @red@p@gre@k@red@ also has a set of rules, although there arn’t", 8151);
sendQuest("@red@many. These rules are similar to rules of other servers.", 8152);
sendQuest("@red@So to have fun and enjoy your time, please follow them.", 8153);
sendQuest("@blu@Rule1: @red@ do not mass, barrage or noclip.", 8155);
sendQuest("@red@ only the admins/owners can barrage and no clip.", 8156);
sendQuest("@red@ if you do this stuff u will be kicked then again then banned.", 8157);
sendQuest("@red@ the owner is mervboyj and the 2 co-owners are", 8158);
sendQuest("@red@ icy fresh00 and meller mager", 8159);
sendQuest("@red@ and the admins are crazyryan41 and some others…", 8160);
sendQuest("@blu@Rule 2: @red@ please if admins get a perfect ring", 8162);
sendQuest("@red@ please do not abuse because it is not fair to other players like", 8163);
sendQuest("@red@ non mods/admins.", 8164);
sendQuest("@blu@Rule 3: @red@ Use of the ::setitem command is strictly prohibited.", 8166);
sendQuest("@red@Using this command will get you banned immediately.", 8167);
sendQuest("@blu@Rule 4: @red@ Begging is annoying, so please refrain.", 8169);
sendQuest("@red@Moderators have been instructed to mute you for this.", 8170);
sendQuest("@red@Mutes are permanent on @red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y @red@p@gre@k, they will not run out.", 8171);
sendQuest("@dbl@If you feel you have been wrongly banned, immobilised,", 8173);
sendQuest("@dbl@muted, or teleblocked, appeal on the forums.", 8174);
sendQuest("@dbl@Thankyou for taking the time to read these rules!", 8175);

				sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj's Personal Commands", 8170);
				sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it is currently off", 8171);
				sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it is currently on", 8172);
				sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a player, doesn't run out", 8173);
				sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or temp muted player", 8174);
				sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me unable to be attacked by players", 8175);
				sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me attackable again by other players", 8176);
				sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent Pk gear to kill people", 8177);
				sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player into a Moderator instantly", 8178);
				sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player into an Admin instantly", 8179);
				sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or Mod back into a normal player", 8180);
				sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command to trigger an update if needed", 8181);
				sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will kick ALL players on the server", 8182);
				sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who can't use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);
				sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to make them unattackable by others", 8184);
				sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to make them attackable by players", 8185);
				sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);
				sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats go back to their regular levels", 8187);
				sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in the main game window to players", 8188);
				sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me visible again if I am invisible", 8189);
				sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right click option change to IP ban", 8190);

Read full topic
